short_summary: All-Terrain Vehicle (ATV) Youth, 2x4 4 Stroke Gasoline Engine
description: AMENDMENT 004 THIS SOLICITATION AMENDMENT IS RAISED TO: ...
full_summary:
## Request for Proposal
### Bid Invitation: All-Terrain Vehicle (ATV) Youth

The Department of National Defence (DND) issues a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the procurement of sixteen (16) All-Terrain Vehicle (ATV) Youth, 2x4 4 Stroke Gasoline Engine. The requested delivery date is 240 days from the contract start date. The solicitation is open to all interested suppliers.

### Contract Details
- **Reference Number**: PW-23-01027941
- **Amendment Number**: 4
- **Solicitation Number**: W8476-236622/B
- **Publication Date**: 2023-02-27
- **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-04-25T14:00:00

The RFP uses electronic receipt of bids by email only. For details, please review the Electronic Submission of Bids section in the solicitation document.

### Contact Information
- **Contracting Entity**: Department of National Defence
- **Contact Name**: Lee, Wo il
- **Contact Email**: [woil.lee@forces.gc.ca](mailto:woil.lee@forces.gc.ca)
